clusterList.phrase: he has a passion for acting to survive a war that gives you enough determination that anything is possible he believes life will go on forever
but he knows something is up
he knows what i'm trying to do and when i don't do it he knows

i'm sure he has goals that he's not sharing with anybody that will make him special but a step at a time he doesn't want to put any extra pressure on himself the last thing john wants is to come out and say i'm going to do this and that

his logic isn't misplaced but the practicality of it is it's the choice he's making we want to respect that but the door is open please come he can make himself a nice career and do it sooner rather than later but he has to feel that way
if he does everything he's supposed to do
there's no doubt in his mind that this is what he wants to do
he doesn't know for sure but he can't imagine who else would do that to him
